item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact with me by writing an email: p.wachulec (at) gmail.com or by social media. All of my socials you can find on main page or on my profile on SocialsHub.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi! My name is Piotr. Let me tell you something about me.
Technically Currently C#/.NET developer with about 2 years of commercial experience in these technologies. Also associated with Microsoft Azure cloud for two years (I passed AZ-900 exam). Most projects used: .NET Core 2.1+ Azure App Service Azure SQL Database Azure Functions Storage Account Cosmos DB VMs SignalR Logic Apps Azure AD/Graph API Key Vault I have experience also with other Azure services.
